channel.title: Arcanum
channel.description:
Since everyone seems to dislike the way this community is managed, a few respected individuals have come together to create something which we hope will present a solution. We are fully aware that most new communities fail, though this one has a few differences.
[ul][li]There are no strict rules. It's a community.[/li] [li]Large scale plans to change the entire scene in one way or another. [/li] [li]It's a place that isn't centered around Runescape. In fact, we only have one section dedicated to it. Due to the amount of interest in AoE, we have allowed a forum for that.[/li] [li]A place that arguments and differences are encouraged. Unlike other places, we understand that this is capable of causing progression. [/li][/ul]
Basically, sppt and i are hoping to create something a little different. Give it some time and effort and hopefully we will be able to start a fully working community.
Link: removed, and soon to be found in signatures of various users

item.title: Arcanum
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Welcome to Arcanum. Thanks goes to Ollie for the hosting and use of his domain name. [b]Our main priority is to get the member count up to as high as possible by mid January.[/b] After this, we will consider making this an invite only community. In regards to the banner, this will be fixed once somebody decides to create us a bit of GFX.

I’m not going to bother posting a set amount of rules. We really only have a problem with spamming and advertising. If flaming or arguments get too out of hand, we will move the topic or post to the Debates/Arguments forum. I enjoy watching two idiots fight for absolutely no reason as much as the next person.

We will be using #mopar as our IRC channel. I see no use in dividing a community that’s already horribly split.


I bolded the portions that I personally found amusing. ;D

I have no problems with site advertisement, but I expect you guys, like everyone else, to limit advertisement to your signatures.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Tree wrote:

Since everyone seems to dislike the way this community is managed, a few respected individuals have come together to create something which we hope will present a solution. We are fully aware that most new communities fail, though this one has a few differences.

[ul][li]There are no strict rules. It’s a community.[/li]
[li]Large scale plans to change the entire scene in one way or another. [/li]
[li]It’s a place that isn’t centered around Runescape. In fact, we only have one section dedicated to it. Due to the amount of interest in AoE, we have allowed a forum for that.[/li]
[li]A place that arguments and differences are encouraged. Unlike other places, we understand that this is capable of causing progression. [/li][/ul]

Basically, sppt and i are hoping to create something a little different. Give it some time and effort and hopefully we will be able to start a fully working community.
